items.question: How to add new devices in the TaHoma¬Æ app?
items.answer: To add a new device, open the TaHoma¬Æ app, click 'Add Device', select the device type, and follow the instructions to connect it to your Wi-Fi network and integrate it into your home automation system.

items.question: How to add a voice assistant in the TaHoma¬Æ app?
items.answer: In the TaHoma¬Æ app, go to settings, select 'Voice Assistants', then choose the desired assistant (Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant‚Ä¶). Follow the steps to link your account and enable voice control for your devices.

items.question: How to choose the right automation hub?
items.answer: The choice depends on the number of devices you want to manage, the protocol type (Zigbee, RTS, Z-Wave), and the desired features (scenes, alerts, remote control). Our experts can guide you to select the right hub for your home.

items.question: How do I know if my device is compatible with your smart solutions?
items.answer: All compatible devices are listed in the TaHoma¬Æ app or on our website. Check the compatibility logos (RTS, Somfy, Zigbee, etc.) or contact support for confirmation.

items.question: Connected devices: Somfy checklist
